unnormalised: Arre bhai, tumchea PAN card number-ak tumchea Aadhaar-ak 31/03 poilim link korunk visrun naka! Ani, tumi ek business suru kortat zalear, tumchem GSTIN jetlem sokol zata titlem begin sort kora; mhojem 27AXYZ1234A1Z5 asa.
normalised: Arre bhai, tumchea P-A-N card number tumchea Aadhaar cardak teees ektees march-a poilim link korunk yaad thev! Ani tumi eak business suru kortat zalear, tumchem G-S-T-I-N chalu korunk A-S-A-P; mhojem sattees A X-Y-Z ek don tin char A ek Z panch asa.
text: Arre bhai, tumchea PAN card number-ak tumchea Aadhaar-ak 31/03 poilim link korunk visrun naka! Ani, tumi ek business suru kortat zalear, tumchem GSTIN jetlem sokol zata titlem begin sort kora; mhojem 27AXYZ1234A1Z5 asa.
